openGraph.description: Join our team of 200+ engineers building enterprise software solutions.

hero.headline: Join the InsightExus Team
hero.subheadline: Help us build transformative enterprise software solutions. We're hiring across engineering, design, and more.

culture.headline: Our Culture & Values
culture.description: We believe great software comes from great people working in a supportive, innovative environment.

highlights.title: Mission-Driven
highlights.description: We're solving real problems for customers in fintech, healthcare, e-commerce, and SaaS. Your work makes a measurable impact.

highlights.title: Remote-First
highlights.description: Work from anywhere. We have team members across 25+ countries. Full flexibility and async-friendly culture.

highlights.title: Learning & Growth
highlights.description: $5K/year learning budget per employee. Paid conference attendance, certification support, and mentorship from senior engineers.

highlights.title: Work-Life Balance
highlights.description: We respect your time. Flexible hours, unlimited PTO, generous parental leave, and wellness benefits.

highlights.title: Inclusive & Diverse
highlights.description: We actively build a diverse team and foster an inclusive culture. We celebrate our differences and perspectives.

highlights.title: Competitive Compensation
highlights.description: Market-competitive salaries, equity packages, comprehensive health insurance, 401(k) matching, and performance bonuses.

openPositions.headline: Open Positions
openPositions.description: We're actively hiring for these roles. Apply now or refer a friend!

positions.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
positions.description: Build scalable web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. Lead architectural decisions and mentor junior engineers.
requirements: Experience with microservices and distributed systems
responsibilities: Lead code reviews and architecture discussions
Collaborate with product and design teams

positions.title: Senior Backend Engineer
positions.description: Design and implement scalable backend systems. Work on microservices, databases, and cloud infrastructure.
requirements: Expert in Node.js, Python, or Go
Deep knowledge of databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
Experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration

positions.title: Frontend Engineer (React/Next.js)
positions.description: Build beautiful, performant user interfaces using React and Next.js. Focus on accessibility and user experience.
requirements: Experience with Next.js or similar frameworks
Understanding of CSS and responsive design
responsibilities: Collaborate with designers and backend teams

positions.title: DevOps & Infrastructure Engineer
positions.description: Build and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure. Work with Kubernetes, CI/CD, and monitoring systems.
requirements: Expert in Kubernetes and container technologies
Experience with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)

positions.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
positions.description: Ensure quality through testing, automation, and process improvement. Build robust testing frameworks.
requirements: Strong JavaScript or Python for test scripting
Understanding of CI/CD and testing best practices
Experience with Selenium, Jest, or similar tools

positions.title: Product Designer
positions.description: Design user-centered products that solve real problems. Lead design from discovery to launch.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma or similar design tools
Understanding of user research and usability testing
Experience designing for enterprise or SaaS products
responsibilities: Lead design process from discovery to delivery
Create wireframes, prototypes, and design specs
Collaborate with engineering and product teams

openPositions.applyInstructions: Visit our careers portal to apply. Include your resume, portfolio (for design roles), and GitHub profile (for engineering roles).

referral.headline: Know Someone Great? Refer Them!
referral.description: We reward referrals. If you know someone who'd be a great fit, refer them and earn up to $3,000 if they're hired.

interview.headline: Our Interview Process
interview.description: Fair, transparent, and focused on your strengths

stages.title: Phone Screen
stages.description: Quick conversation about your background, interests, and the role

stages.title: Technical Assessment
stages.description: Hands-on coding exercise or design challenge relevant to the role

stages.title: Team Interviews
stages.description: Meet with engineering leads, team members, and hiring managers

stages.title: Offer & Negotiation
stages.description: Discuss offer details, compensation, and next steps

commitment.headline: Our Commitment to Hiring
items: We provide equal opportunity to all qualified candidates regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or other protected status.
We provide accommodation for candidates with disabilities during the interview process.
We celebrate diversity and believe it strengthens our team and our products.
We're committed to building a culture where everyone feels welcomed and can do their best work.

cta.description: Explore open positions and apply today.
